title: Clocktower

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Trap someone's soul in the Clocktower.
- Trapped individuals do not reveal their roles on death, may speak after death, and may vote once after death.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Your action cannot be prevented in any way.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the majority of dead players Trapped by the end of the game.

desc:

The townsfolk rush to investigate and find the beloved local storyteller has been murdered, their body hanging limp from the clocktower. As blood drips onto the cobblestones below, a realisation slowly dawnsâ€¦ a demon has been unleashed, killing by night and taking on human form by day."*
